title: Land for sale in Pelawatte 52 perch (main road & Lake facing)
details:
52 perch land ( Main road and lake facing )

It's a lake facing property with a wide frontage more than 150ft which is ideal to built an apartment complex,

luxury restaurant or a holiday resort etc.
An attractive location where you have a high commercial value in one of the fast developing areas around Colombo city.

Just about 5 minutes distance to overseas international school ,
walking distance to pelawatte junction and most importantly it's a breathtaking view from the land overlooking the lake. Size : 52 perch rectangular block

Price 5.5 million per perch x 52 Contact us for more details on 0771 163 168
